title: DPS Hour 3
itunes:title: DPS Hour 3
description:
Mike Piazza talks to Dan about the new system in MLB to help hide pitching signs. Mike says hitters are more concerned about location rather than what pitch is coming.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
